message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"middle school student","sentence":"中学生在学校。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image depicting a Chinese middle school student standing in a school environment—simple classroom or school gate, wearing a typical school uniform and holding books, with gentle pastel post-apocalyptic skies in the background, no visible danger or threat, everything calm and ordinary.","sentence_translation":"The middle school student is at school."}
